snippet: This is a year of anger in politics. Voters are angry at economic misery, at politicians who give themselves perks, at institutions that do not work. They are in a mood to punish, to destroy.   Jerry Brown fits that mood. He comes on as a Savonaro...
lead_paragraph: This is a year of anger in politics. Voters are angry at economic misery, at politicians who give themselves perks, at institutions that do not work. They are in a mood to punish, to destroy. Jerry Brown fits that mood. He comes on as a Savonarola who would purge an impure system. And if there is a real Jerry Brown underneath the various political masks, it may be something like that: Savonarola.

headline.main: Abroad at Home; Wreck Or Rescue?
